channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish on pavement includes glass bottles from bin left on pavement at 128 St Peter’s Road, 2nd October
item.description:
128 leve overflowing bins on pavement , rubbish including glass bottles is now strewn across the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Peter's Road, Ponders End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of domestic and garden waste have been dumped at the junction of Kemsing Road and Ormiston Road, 2nd October
item.description:
Bags of domestic and garden waste have been dumped at the junction of Kemsing Road and Ormiston Road. The fly tipping extends across the pavement and is a hazard to children and elderly pedestrians. The pavement is used by children attending the local Halstow Road school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Ormiston Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattress, 2nd October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heavitree Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Stickers advertising prostitutes on red phone boxes. Belgrave Road Piazza/Bin area, 2nd October
item.description:
Similar to my other report about the other phone boxes down the road... these ones also have stickers advertising prostitutes on the glass. Please could they be removed. Thanks so much.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Denbigh Street, Pimlico, London

item.title: All mess in one, full bins, dumped bags with woods, messy pavement and road....very nice!, 2nd October

item.title: Stickers advertising prostitutes on red phone boxes!, 2nd October
item.description:
Stickers advertising prostitutes on red phone boxes! Next to Hamptons (50 Belgrave Rd, Pimlico, London SW1V 1RH) The stickers are vulgar and may be facilitating explotation of people. Please could they be removed. Thank you for your work!

item.title: Bus shelter 0111 0282 at bus stop BA Blackheath / Royal Standard towards Greenwich Or North Greenwich : Countdown screen blank, 2nd October
item.description:
Bus shelter 0111 0282 at bus stop BA Blackheath / Royal Standard towards Greenwich Or North Greenwich : Countdown screen blank. For 5+ days now Countdown has been blank with just orange dot flashing in bottom left hand corner. Other Countdowns in area working normally. See photographs attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 184, Westcombe Hill, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
